snippet: Turns out, DeAndre Jordan does more than catch lobs. Sometimes he grabs offensive rebounds and scores to clinch games for the Los Angeles Clippers....
lead_paragraph: Turns out, DeAndre Jordan does more than catch lobs. Sometimes he grabs offensive rebounds and scores to clinch games for the Los Angeles Clippers.

headline.main: Clippers Hang On and Beat Heat for 4th Straight Win, 102-98
headline.print_headline: Clippers Hang On and Beat Heat for 4th Straight Win, 102-98
